title: Solve the 6.0->7.0 index compatibility issue
description:
Once a decision is made regarding how to solve the 6.0->7.0 compatibility problem introduced by deprecating Lucene's numeric classes, update the issue title and this description, then implement the solution.

I think the current frontrunner is: Move the classes deprecated by LUCENE-6917 to the solr-core module in the master branch, leave the deprecated annotation, then remove them in 8.0.
